name: Chicken Teriyaki
recipe:
1. Marinate chicken in teriyaki sauce for 30 minutes.
2. Cook in pan until done.
3. Serve with steamed rice and broccoli.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipe:
1. Cook spaghetti.
2. Fry pancetta until crisp.
3. Mix eggs, cheese, pepper. Combine with pasta and pancetta off heat.

name: Paella
recipe:
1. Cook chicken and chorizo in paella pan.
2. Add rice, saffron, stock, peas, prawns.
3. Simmer until rice is cooked and stock absorbed.

name: Beef Bulgogi
recipe:
1. Marinate beef slices in bulgogi marinade.
2. Stir fry quickly on high heat.
3. Serve with steamed rice and kimchi.

name: Margherita Pizza
recipe:
1. Prepare pizza dough.
2. Spread tomato sauce, add mozzarella and basil.
3. Bake until crust is golden.

name: Seafood Paella
recipe:
1. Cook onions and garlic in olive oil.
2. Add rice, stock, saffron.
3. Add prawns, mussels, and squid rings until cooked.

name: Pad Thai
recipe:
1. Soak rice noodles.
2. Stir fry tofu, egg, shrimp.
3. Add noodles, pad thai sauce, and peanuts.

name: Lasagna
recipe:
1. Layer pasta sheets with meat sauce and béchamel.
2. Repeat layers.
3. Top with cheese and bake until golden.

name: Chicken Fajitas
recipe:
1. Marinate chicken strips in fajita seasoning.
2. Stir fry with bell peppers and onions.
3. Serve with tortillas.

name: Risotto alla Milanese
recipe:
1. Cook onions in butter.
2. Add arborio rice and saffron.
3. Gradually add stock until creamy, then stir in parmesan.

name: Tom Yum Soup
recipe:
1. Boil stock with lemongrass, galangal, and kaffir lime leaves.
2. Add prawns, mushrooms, and chili paste.
3. Finish with fish sauce and lime juice.

name: Tortilla Española
recipe:
1. Fry potatoes and onions in olive oil.
2. Combine with beaten eggs.
3. Cook slowly until set.

name: Bibimbap
recipe:
1. Prepare rice.
2. Arrange assorted sautéed vegetables and beef on top.
3. Add fried egg and gochujang sauce before serving.

name: Ratatouille
recipe:
1. Slice eggplant, zucchini, peppers, tomatoes.
2. Layer in baking dish with olive oil and herbs.
3. Bake until tender.

name: Chicken Katsu Curry
recipe:
1. Bread and fry chicken cutlets.
2. Prepare Japanese curry sauce.
3. Serve with rice and chicken cutlets on top.

name: Tonkotsu Ramen
recipe:
1. Prepare pork bone broth.
2. Add ramen noodles.
3. Top with sliced pork belly, egg, and green onions.

name: Seafood Linguine
recipe:
1. Cook linguine.
2. Sauté garlic in olive oil, add mixed seafood.
3. Toss with pasta and parsley.

name: Gyoza
recipe:
1. Prepare pork and cabbage filling.
2. Wrap in gyoza wrappers.
3. Pan fry then steam until cooked.

name: Patatas Bravas
recipe:
1. Fry potato cubes until crispy.
2. Serve with spicy tomato sauce.

name: Thai Green Curry
recipe:
1. Fry green curry paste in coconut milk.
2. Add chicken and vegetables.
3. Simmer until cooked, serve with rice.

name: Salmon Teriyaki
recipe:
1. Marinate salmon fillets in teriyaki sauce.
2. Grill until cooked.
3. Serve with rice and steamed broccoli.

name: Fettuccine Alfredo
recipe:
1. Cook fettuccine.
2. Toss with butter, cream, and parmesan cheese until creamy.

name: Beef Stroganoff
recipe:
1. Sauté beef strips and onions.
2. Add mushrooms and sour cream sauce.
3. Serve with egg noodles.

name: Gazpacho
recipe:
1. Blend tomatoes, cucumber, bell pepper, onion, garlic, olive oil, and vinegar.
2. Chill before serving.

name: Chicken Satay
recipe:
1. Marinate chicken in satay marinade.
2. Grill on skewers.
3. Serve with peanut sauce.

name: Calamari Fritti
recipe:
1. Coat squid rings in flour.
2. Deep fry until golden.
3. Serve with lemon wedges.

name: Chicken Enchiladas
recipe:
1. Roll shredded chicken in tortillas with enchilada sauce.
2. Top with cheese and bake.

name: Okonomiyaki
recipe:
1. Mix cabbage with batter and eggs.
2. Pan fry into pancakes.
3. Top with okonomiyaki sauce and mayonnaise.

name: Sushi Rolls
recipe:
1. Prepare sushi rice.
2. Roll with nori and fillings.
3. Slice and serve with soy sauce.
